originalText.text: Excellent Doctor. Set our expectations in a good place and then surpassed them. Very happy with the results! My daughter is a softie and he was gentle and kind to her every single visit. The staff at the front desk is superb. Very nice team!

text.text: Excellent Doctor. Set our expectations in a good place and then surpassed them. Very happy with the results! My daughter is a softie and he was gentle and kind to her every single visit. The staff at the front desk is superb. Very nice team!

originalText.text:
My treatment started on Feb 2021 and lasted until Oct 2022. The staff was really supportive and the attention was awesome.

It felt like a short time while I looked at the fantastic change through time in my mouth.

I 100% recommend going and checking out this place if you need treatment.

originalText.text: My experience was amazing, everyone went above and beyond to meet my expectations. My son and I were treated like family from the moment we walked in. Everyone was always friendly and knowledgeable when ever I had any questions about my sons treatment. I would definitely recommend this orthodontist office and will be coming back for future treatments.

text.text: My experience was amazing, everyone went above and beyond to meet my expectations. My son and I were treated like family from the moment we walked in. Everyone was always friendly and knowledgeable when ever I had any questions about my sons treatment. I would definitely recommend this orthodontist office and will be coming back for future treatments.

originalText.text: As a 70+ year-old woman who wore metal braces, once as a teenager and again in my 40’s when my children wore braces, I was bothered by the fact that one of my bottom teeth had moved completely behind the others. While it wasn’t noticeable to people, it bothered me, so I went to Dr. Pliakas for treatment. I thought he was going to recommend that the tooth be pulled, but instead he told me that he could completely realign my teeth using Invisalign.  I could not be more pleased with the results. He is a magician!  Over the course of a year-and-a-half, I used 42 clear plastic aligners to move my teeth into position and an additional 10 aligners to ensure that my teeth were perfectly straight. Upon finishing the treatment, I only need to use a retainer for a few more months on a daily basis and then just at night. The process was easy – I wore the aligners 24/7 except when eating, and changed them on a 1-2 week schedule as prescribed.  I had little to no discomfort, just a bit of sensitivity when eating on the first or second day of using a new aligner.  My speech was unaffected and no one knew I was wearing an aligner unless I told them. Invisalign is an amazing technology and Dr. Pliakas makes the experience easy and produces outstanding results.  I highly recommend him if you want to have a beautiful smile!

originalText.text: I am so glad a friend recommended Dr.Pliakas. I took my 3 children for consultations with him. He told me my oldest was ready for treatment and we started his braces in September. For my other two, he recommended that we wait and just follow up with them in a year. I’ve been so impressed with Dr.Pliakas and his staff that I decided to do Invisalign with him. And I’m so happy I did. My friends can’t believe the transformation of my smile!
